isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Power Source (Sleeper) W/PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) W/PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: Two Power Sources (power sockets) are provided to enable 12 volt accessories to be plugged in. One socket is located near the power distribution center on the left side and the other socket is located near the base of the bunk coming out of the right luggage compartment.
